data.title: Motorola Solutions Acquires Terayon Communication Systems
data.meta_description: On July 20, 2007, Motorola Solutions acquired communications company Terayon Communication Systems
data.text: Motorola Solutions designs, manufactures, and sells communications infrastructure, devices, system software and applications, and provides services associated with their use. The Company's products and services are designed to help government and enterprise customers improve their operations through increased effectiveness and efficiency of their mobile workforce and can be found in a wide range of workplaces. Motorola Solutions was founded in 1928 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.
